assets.Details: Main folder with files that are always required in mods.

BendX2X.Details: Boy to Girl gateway for all assets and logic

Required.Character.png: Image atlas for a given character. Used in conversation.
Required.CharacterOW.png: Sprite atlas for a given character. Used in the overworld
Required.Character_ImageData.json: Gateway containing logic for sprites and images.
Required.Character_StringData.json: Gateway containing logic for unique genderbend string data that is easier to maintain in a separate location.

Optional.Character_Beach.png: Image atlas for characters that go to Ginger Island. Used in conversation.
Optional.Character_Winter.png: Image atlas for characters that have winter outfits. Used in conversation.
Optional.CharacterOW_Beach.png: Sprite atlas for characters that go to Ginger Island.
Optional.CharacterOW_WeddingDance.png: Sprite atlas used for the wedding or Flower Dance scenes.
Optional.CharacterOW_Winter.png: Sprite atlas for characters that have winter outfits.
Optional.Location.tbin: TO BE UPDATED BUT I BELIEVE IT IS FOR MAP UPDATES.

BendX2X.B2G_Portraits.png: Image data to be used for updating purchaseable portraits.
BendX2X.Cursors.png: Extra images to be used in replacements.

ModSupport.Details: Provides logic for when additional mods are applied.

StringData.Details: The majority of the string data that will be manipulated in this mod.
StringData.Logic: Sets game data to i18n value. Updates i18n value token based on character gender.
StringData.Character_Dialogue.json: All strings from JSON files in the Characters/Dialogue folder.
StringData.Data_Events.json: All strings from JSON files in the Data/Events folder.
StringData.Data_Festivals.json: All strings from JSON files in the Data/Festivals folder.
StringData.Data.json: All strings from JSON files DIRECTLY in the Data folder.
StringData.Strings.json: All strings from JSON files in the Characters/Dialogue folder.

i18n.Details: A central location for all strings to enable easier language support.
i18n.default.json: The complete collection of modified strings.

Adomin8er_s HD (MOD) Portraits.content.json: Main gateway for all assets and logic.
Adomin8er_s HD (MOD) Portraits.manifest.json: Mod metadata, dependencies, and version info.
